nodes.text: Graffam was a male Human Jedi who served the Jedi Order aboard the Galactic Republic space station Carrick Station, selling combat gear during the Cold War between the Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. A light-skinned Human with brown hair, Graffam wore a beard and had a series of scars across the left side of his face. He wore red robes over tan armor, and wielded two lightsabers in combat.

Graffam first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a Centurion PvP Gear Vendor for the Jedi Knight class, though he was removed from the game during an overhaul of the PvP gear system.
